summary: Under hypnosis, a young woman turns into a vampire.
cast: Sandra Harrison|Louise Lewis|Gail Ganley|Jerry Blaine|Heather Ames|Malcolm Atterbury|Mary Adams|Thomas Browne Henry|Don Devlin|Jean Dean|Richard Devon|Paul Maxwell|Shirley Delancey|Michael Hall|Craig Duncan|Edna Holland|Carlyle Mitchell|Voltaire Perkins|Barbara Wilson|Jimmy Hayes|Lynn Alden
title: La sangre de Dracula
